timeline.bodyText: This method was extracted just in case we need to replace it for quarkus.
timeline.author: anistor

replies.bodyText: For quarkus? I don't know. Maybe @wburns ?
replies.author: anistor

replies.bodyText: @anistor I'm pretty sure Quarkus can replace a private method, so it doesn't need to be protected. But it would be nice to have a comment in the code, to prevent others from trying to inline it and finding out that we need it for Quarkus after the PR is integrated.
replies.author: danberindei
